goals__remit:
international universities and scientific research center that cooperates with many other universities and colleges around the world 
 
UNISANPAOLO is a Federal structure University very active in the dialogue between peoples and is participating States to join the initiative leading to the integration of crisitani and Muslims that has already affected more than 3 million people in Italy, we are in close contact with embassies and cooperating with the center of the Palestinian sutidi of Haifa, with the University of Benghazi in Libya, we are cooperating with the University of Moscow and one in Kiev and we have established a channel of dialogue between Russians and Ukrainians, with LUEMAH University, University of San Marino, Hermes University and many other University in the World.
industry_forums: UNISANPAOLO is going to present a project of private funding for the overcoming of the crisis in Europe in order to improve the possibility of expansion of the company through new channels of financing and new markets for exports
relevant_communication:
Currently some groups of researchers and faculty of our university has taken steps to actively participate in the online public consultation of the European Commission on the "European pillar of social rights". 
We are studying the problem, and we intend to provide information, useful tips and information to the European Commission by November 2016. 
 
Another group is preparing a proposal for a European directive to combat effectively and reduce casualties and damage of natural disasters in member countries. 
We believe that such a directive is of paramount importance to reduce the negative effects of such events and the measures proposed will not be burdensome for States do it for Citizens. 
 
A specific study group is also developing a free and multilingual online system to disseminate basic information HACCP to as many citizens in order to improve the quality of life and curb the spread of diseases and food hygiene problems originated.
